values: The Precursors accumulated their total knowledge in a vast reserve of rules and a library of experiences.

"During our debate, the Gravemind hinted at a vast reserve of rules accumulated more than half a billion years ago, a huge library of experiences and disputes codified into the total wisdom of the Precursors."
Approximate time Forerunners first explored Path Kethona.
Approximate time the Forerunner-Precursor war takes place.
Approximate time the Primordial arrived in the galaxy.
"The one the Didact questioned on Charum Hakkor arrived on the margins of our galaxy nine million years before."
Approximate time the Theoretical rate was forcibly merged with the Builder rate.
"Soon after her death, her rate had been forcibly merged with the Builders.
Approximate time a  Forerunner civil war takes place.
"During one of our interminable civil wars, half a million years before my birth..."
Forerunners rise as the prominent species in the galaxy by advancing technological discoveries gathered from the remnants left by the Precursors.
Approximate time ancient humanity began to spread their civilization outward along the galactic arm.
Approximate time of the construction of the Forerunner capital.
Approximate time of the discovery of The Timeless One.
"Forty years before the last of the Human-Forerunner wars..."
Approximate time the Didact spoke to the Primordial.
Approximate time of the discovery of the Flood powder.
Approximate time the Flood left the galaxy.
Approximate time of the beginning of the Human-Forerunner war.
Approximate time the Librarian is given the title Lifeshaper.
"That title came to me just before I walked among the defeated humans at Charum Hakkor."
Approximate time of the end of the Human-Forerunner war.
Approximate time the Librarian established a research station on Erde-Tyrene.
Approximate time Bornstellar's parents are born.
Approximate time Maker of Moons is born.
"Maker was less than two thousand years old."
Approximate time the Confirmer began his watch over the San 'Shyuum quarantine system.
Approximate time the Librarian discovered a hard copy of Boundless`s studies preserved on Keth Sidon.
"A century before the Didact entered his Cryptum..."
Approximate time the Didact was found in comtempt of the council and ordered to halt the construction of his shield worlds.
Approximate time the Didact entered a cryptum and was hidden on Erde-Tyrene.
Approximate time the original 12 Halos were created.
Approximate time the construction of Audacity is started.
The construction took ten years. Permission from the Old Council to make the journey took another ten.
Approximate time the construction of Audacity is completed.
The construction took ten years. Permission from the Old Council to make the journey took another ten.
Approximate time the Old Council grants the Librarian permission to make a journey to Path Kethona.
The construction took ten years. Permission from the Old Council to make the journey took another ten.
Approximate time the Librarian visited Path Kethona.

"After she put you in a Cryptum, and stored the Cryptum on Erde-Tyrene, she commissioned a special ship, assembled a crew, and made a visit to Path Kethona. This was about nine hundred and fifty years ago."
Approximate time the Librarian discovers a biological Domain on a planet in Path Kethona.
Approximate time of first contact between the Forerunner Primary Pioneer group and the Flood on G617 g1.
Soma the painter sends a message to the Auditor and Prelate regarding the first landing of the Flood.
Approximate time 05-032 Mendicant Bias tested Installation 07 at Charum Hakkor.
Approximate time Splendid Dust of Ancient Suns is born.
Approximate time Glory of a Far Dawn is born.
Approximate time Bornstellar Makes Eternal Lasting is born.
Approximate time Maker of Moons's father is assassinated.
"He died ten years ago," she said. "Assassinated at the orders of the Master Builder."
The Librarian visits Janjur Qom to collect San 'Shyuum specimens for cataloging.
Bornstellar Makes Eternal Lasting travels to Erde-Tyrene in search of the Organon.
The Didact is released from his cryptum by Bornstellar.
The Didact and Bornstellar discover the ruins on Charum Hakkor.
Bornstellar undergoes a brevet mutation with the Didact as his sponsor.
The First Prophet is killed by builder forces.
Bornstellar is sent back to his family, the Didact is taken by the Master Builder, and Chakas and Riser are send to Installation 07.
A Halo is fired for the second time in the San 'Shyuum quarantine system.
Bornstellar departs for the Capital to testify against the Master Builder.
The Battle of the Capital occurs.
A Halo is fired for the third time at the Forerunner capital world.
Bornstellar enters a portal from the Capital to the Ark.
Bornstellar meets the Librarian on the Ark.
Chakas, Vinnevra, and Gamelpar discover a gravemind on Installation 07.
The IsoDidact tracks down the rogue Installation 07.
Installation 07 breaks down from 30,000km to 10,000km in diameter.
Chakas is composed and placed in a monitor shell.
The Ur-Didact encounters a Precursor structure.
Precursor structures begin to reawaken around the galaxy.
The Ur-Didact is corrupted by a Gravemind.
Faber rescues the Didact from a Burn.
The Ur-Didact reunites with Bornstellar, the IsoDidact.
The Ur-Didact uses the composer on the human populations on Omega Halo.
The Precursor structures attempt to destroy the Greater Ark. Omega Halo fires, opening a lane for the IsoDidact to escape.
Approximate date Faber is killed in action.
The Librarian places the Ur-Didact in a Cryptum on Requiem.
The Halos are sent from the Lesser Ark to be spread throughout the galaxy.
The Librarian passes the title of Lifeshaper on to Chant-to-Green.
The Librarian begins construction of a portal from Earth to the Lesser Ark.
05-032 Mendicant Bias assembles 4.8 million Flood controlled vessels and breaches the Maginot Sphere.
The Battle of the Maginot Sphere begins.
The IsoDidact fires the Halo array killing all sentient life within 3 galactic radii.
Minutes after the array is fired, Offensive Bias' fleet decimates Mendicant Bias' fleet.
The Battle of the Maginot Sphere ends.
A report is sent to 2401 Penitent Tangent regarding Flood containment failure in a cold storage facility.
Approximate date that a meteor bearing a small Forerunner artifact crashes on the planet that will be known as Sigma Octanus IV.
Halo: The Fall of Reach page 233
Approximate date that an unidentified alien vessel crash-landed in Sector 1215 of Installation 04.
Approximate date the San 'Shyuum become divided into two groups, the Stoics and the Reformists.
Approximate date the San 'Shyuum civil war begins.
Approximate date the San 'Shyuum civil war ends.
1,000 Reformist San 'Shyuum enter the Forerunner dreadnought and flee their homeworld.
The San 'Shyuum encounter the Sangheili on Sanghelios.
The Sangheili finally accept that they must adapt and study their Forerunner relics or face defeat at the hands of the San 'Shyuum.
Mken 'Scre'ah'ben oversees an excavation on the Planet of Blue and Red. His forces are eventually overrun by the Elite Ussa 'Xellus.
The Writ of Union is ratified.
Ussa 'Xellus makes contact with Enduring Bias in the Shield World.
An assassination attempt against Ussa 'Xellus is thwarted.
Ussa 'Xellus leads his people to Shield World 0673.
Mken is selected to lead a mission to Janjur Qom to retrieve a luminary and females for breeding.
Mken and his team arrive at Janjur Qom.
Mken recovers the luminary from the Grotto of the Great Transition.
Mken is betrayed by his group and hides in the Grotto to escape.
'Drem is executed for treason by Ernicka the Scar Maker.
Mken and his group are struck by a projectile while leaving Janjur Qom causing him to lose the Luminary.
'Crolon escapes the Shield World and returns to the Covenant.
Mken arrives at the Shield World to negotiate with Ussa 'Xellus regarding the future of its inhabitants.
To create the illusion his people decided to destroy the Shield World rather than submit to the Covenant, Ussa 'Xellus command Enduring Bias to activate the Shield World's ability to disassemble.
The Lekgolo are discovered by, and incorporated into, the Covenant through the Taming of the Hunters.
The San 'Shyuum homeworld of Janjur Qom is destroyed by a natural stellar collapse.
The Forerunner Dreadnought is made into the centerpiece of the new space station that will serve as the Covenant's capital, High Charity.
The Battle of Thermopylae takes place on Earth.
The Yanme'e are incorporated into the Covenant.
The Kig-Yar are incorporated into the Covenant.
The San 'Shyuum began developing technologies aimed toward increasing their life spans.
The first nuclear weapons are used in military conflict on Earth.
The United Nations is formed on Earth, precursor to the UNSC.
Margaret Efendi starts her beekeeping hobby with a single beehive.
A temporal rip in space-time somehow sends part of the UNSC Apocalypso’s AI, Melissa back to this year.
Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary is released.
The International Society of Civil Engineers is established on Earth.
Humans settle on Luna, Mars, the Jovian Moons, and asteroids.
Humanity concludes a conflict somewhat on par with World War II and the Rain Forest Wars.
Glasslands page 33: "People in 1945 - and 2090, 2103, 2162 - could recall what peace felt like and knew what they'd missed."
Humanity concludes a conflict somewhat on par with World War II and the Rain Forest Wars.
Glasslands page 33: "People in 1945 - and 2090, 2103, 2162 - could recall what peace felt like and knew what they'd missed."
The Unggoy are incorporated into the Covenant.
The conflict took place "at the close of the Rain Forest Wars"
The United Security Acts of 2162 and Homeland Security Act of 2162 are created.
The United Nations Space Command is formed.
The Argyre Planitia Campaign takes place.
The Interplanetary War begins between the Koslovics and Friedens.
The military novel "A Soldier's Tale: Rainforest Wars" is first published.
The first UNSC military bioengineering protocols are created, which would later form the basis of the ORION (SPARTAN-I) Project.
The Interplanetary War ends with the signing of the Callisto Treaty.
The Unified Earth Government is formed.
The Shaw-Fujikawa Translight Engine is created.
Wallace Fujikawa / Tobias Shaw memorial plaques
The Committee of Mind for Security proposes vigorous modeling of first contact scenarios.
Construction of the Quito space tether is completed.
The ORION project is first initiated, and then cancelled until 2491.
Halo Evolutions "From the Office of Dr. William Arthur Iqbal" page 519
Hod Rumnt (High Prophet of Mercy) is born.
Halo: The Essential Visuals Guide page 147
Halo: The Essential Visuals Guide page 151
The colony ship Odyssey is launched.
The colonization of the inner colonies is fully underway. Humanity has colonized 210 worlds at this point.
Ord Casto (High Prophet of Truth) is born.
Halo: The Essential Visuals Guide page 149
The Quito Space Tether (constructed in 2313) is finally named.
A member of The Assembly recommends that members of the group on occasion submit to vivisection by our creators for the benefit of both groups.
